value:
Listen up: I'm only here for the
festival. I didn't think I'd actually
have to wear this thing. Really!

I became the ruling khan of Regna
Ferox by besting all others. There are
none stronger in my kingdom.$k$pHm, maybe I should be looking for a
strong partner somewhere outside
our borders...

Sheesh, this is one hell of a festival.
My people might enjoy a diversion
like this after the fighting tournament.

Hey, you got something to say to me?
I know I probably don't look the most
natural in this dress...$k$pBut stop trying to find some polite
way to tell me that and just spit it
out already!

Don't think wearing a fancy dress
will stop me from training hard like
I always do. The clothes serve me!

Don't ask about the dress. Do come
to the ceremony though! Oh, here's
a gift from $Nf.

Protect your family and support your
companion, huh? Kind of reminds me
of my duties as ruling khan.$k$pGuess this whole "wife" thing won't
be so hard after all!

If things keep going this well, I might
just become the strongest bride alive!

Hey! You're supposed to walk me
down the aisle, not into a ditch!

I'm feeling better than ever! Seems
like spending time with you might
have something to do with that, eh?

I'm Flavia, ruling khan of Regna
Ferox. Don't give me that look. I'm
just as confused as you are!

Whew, I'm beat. My muscles are on
fire... How about you massage the
knots out, $Nu?$k$pYou can start with my feet. Yeah,
that's good. Hm, maybe I could get
used to being pampered like this...$k$pAt least, that's what I thought at the
beginning of the festival. I can't say
I'm a fan of the frilly clothes, though.$k$pAll right, lower back next. Keep it
moving. Anyway, this just proves that
weddings are the same everywhere.$k$pCouples are always subjected to all
this flashiness and ceremony. It just
isn't my thing, and never has been.$k$pI was raised to fight tooth and nail,
to barrel through all the dirt and
grime necessary to win.$k$pHell, I became ruling khan through a
fighting tournament.$k$pI thought this sort of outfit didn't suit
me at all, that maybe it was time to
cast it aside...$k$pBut you obviously think it looks good
on me. What? I can tell by your face!$k$pYou're not nearly as subtle as you
think you are. Much like a certain old
oaf I know back home...$k$pYou know what, I suppose I'll keep
playing along until the festival is
over, dress and all.$k$pLet's finish up with the shoulders,
then. Well, what are you waiting for?
Get to it already!
Oh, I do!
I'll do the protecting!
Always!
Where do you think you're going?
That was rude...
Thinking this look doesn't suit me, aren't you? Ha! I can see right through you.
*scoff* Mock me again and you'll meet my blade.
What would I do for my wedding? I'd get the whole country together for a fighting tournament!
I'd be the strongest wife there is, protecting both my husband and my country!
You want to know what I look for in a man? I bet you do.
Wonder if I'll get married one day... You never know.
You can walk me down the aisle then. You're honored, I can tell.
Yes?
What next?
Leave 'em to me, honey!
